entry.title: Codecademy Challenge
entry.content:
I love to challenge myself. So, I decided to kick off this blog by giving myself a challenge to complete the Computer Science Track on Codecademy. In this track, I will be learning

  • Python
  • Git
  • Recursion
  • Linked Lists
  • Stacks
  • Queues
  • Trees
  • Hash Maps
  • and much more...


    • According to the Codecademy website, this track will take about ~200 hours to complete. I realize it is unrealistic for many to take this track (Codecademy costs $240 a year) so I will be offering free alternatives that will give a similar experience. I will also be taking notes and giving additional resources to those who want to learn alongside me.

    Starting tomorrow, I will be posting updates daily while I work towards completing this. I hope you will join me!
entry.summary: I love to challenge myself. So, I decided to kick off this blog by giving myself a challenge to complete the Computer Science Track on Codecademy. In this track, I will be learning
